value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|...And that's the tour of the castle!
If you have any questions, just ask!$k$p$WmMPID_ナギ,ch01_32_Nagi_F_Normal,Face|Thank you, Princess Sharena...$k$p$WmMPID_ノルン,ch01_34_Norn_F_Normal,Face|I can hardly believe we were shown
around the castle by the princess
herself... I feel like I should apologize!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Not at all! We're counting on all you
Heroes to help us, after all!$k$pShowing you around the castle is
the least I can do!$k$p$WmMPID_シリウス,ch01_31_Sirius_M_Normal,Face|If it is our purpose, I, for one, will
focus all my effort on restoring
peace to Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Well, I'm happy to hear it! Now I have
some other things to take care of, but
I'll see you all later!$k$p$WmMPID_フィーナ,ch01_33_Fina_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ナギ,ch01_32_Nagi_F_Normal,Face|Is something...wrong, Phina?$k$p$WmMPID_フィーナ,ch01_33_Fina_F_Normal,Face|Hm? Oh, I'm just a bit in awe after
seeing so many Heroes as we toured
the castle halls!$k$p$WmMPID_ノルン,ch01_34_Norn_F_Normal,Face|Same here! There were Heroes so
famous, I already knew their names!
...And quite a few of them too!$k$p$WmMPID_フィーナ,ch01_33_Fina_F_Normal,Face|The Order of Heroes is made up of
such extraordinary people... We'll
have to try really hard to stand out!$k$p$WmMPID_ナギ,ch01_32_Nagi_F_Normal,Face|Stand...out? Where must we stand?$k$p$WmMPID_フィーナ,ch01_33_Fina_F_Normal,Face|I mean we need to be useful, or we
might be overlooked compared to all
the great Heroes already here!$k$p$WmMPID_ノルン,ch01_34_Norn_F_Normal,Face|B-but...what can we do to be useful
when everyone here is already so
willing and able?!$k$p$WmMPID_フィーナ,ch01_33_Fina_F_Normal,Face|If you ask me...we should focus on
what's important: looking good! Good
fashion sense will make us shine!$k$pIf we can draw everyone's eyes,
there's NO WAY we'll be overlooked!$k$p$WmMPID_シリウス,ch01_31_Sirius_M_Normal,Face|We were called here to risk our lives
on the battlefield.$k$pWe have little time to worry about
our appearance...$k$p$WmMPID_フィーナ,ch01_33_Fina_F_Normal,Face|Is that so, Sirius? Why the mask then?
Is it not to look...FASHIONABLE?$k$p$WmMPID_シリウス,ch01_31_Sirius_M_Normal,Face|...No. This mask serves a much more
consequential purpose.$k$p$WmMPID_フィーナ,ch01_33_Fina_F_Normal,Face|Sirius, didn't you say you want to
lend Prince Marth your strength?$k$pIf you never get deployed, you won't
be able to help Prince Marth when
he needs you the most, right?$k$p$WmMPID_シリウス,ch01_31_Sirius_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ナギ,ch01_32_Nagi_F_Normal,Face|I...do not understand this...fashion.$k$pBut...if it can deepen our bonds with
others, so we might aid them...$k$p$WmMPID_フィーナ,ch01_33_Fina_F_Normal,Face|All right, then it's decided! Since we
were all brought here together, let's
all work together!$k$pAnd so...let Operation: Time to Shine
begin! Let's all do our best to stand
out so we're not overlooked!$k$p$WmMPID_ノルン,ch01_34_Norn_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... I'm not so sure about this...$k$p
